about_the_game:
This is the official 'Star Story: The Horizon Escape' game OST.
Journey and battle songs.
The original soundtrack performed by EvilCoGames Studio and by IK-music.

The DLC contains the following tracks:
  • Main Game Theme
  • Battle Theme
  • Cave Theme
  • Grimdesert Theme
  • Jukebox Theme
  • Oasis Theme
  • Openspace Theme
  • Psychodream Theme
  • Spasecraft Theme
  • Bonus track - Video Trailer Theme

(All files MP3 format up to 320 kbps)

Songs will be placed in your 'Star Story' folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Star Story The Horizon Escape\StarStory OST


What is Star Story: The Horizon Escape?
The archaeological research mission faced some unexpected difficulties. Your spaceship crashed. Can you escape from this planet? But how? No one can help you. You are here all alone. Or not? Do you have a plan? Will you find what it takes to be a hero?

Star Story: The Horizon Escape is a turn-based adventure game with text-rpg elements.
Tune into the story of the aspiring space-archaeologist Van Klik on his mission to the mysterious planet of Horizon!

  • Text-based gameplay diversity

    The core classic. Dive into the stories and find a way to exploit EVERY possible situation.

  • Non-linear plot development, 24 alternative endings

    Your choices define the story. Totaly.

  • Game mechanics

    A mix of dialogues, choices, turn-based battles, puzzles, crafting and technology researches.

  • Turn-based philosophy

    Everything is turn-based. No time-limit for making decisions, no quick-time events, no rush: you decide on the speed you want to play.

  • Beautiful world and colorful characters

    Enjoy the wild and crazy sceneries of the world of Horizon and meet the locals! Deserts with shrimps, bandidos at jungles, alian girls at alien cities…

Need A break? The Horizon Is Waiting!

P.S. Space shrimps are included...
